nodes.bodyText: Does it need to be public? Or package private would do?
By testing, listByScope should be the right one as parsing id would fail if it is resource group id here.
Should it expose owners as well?
Could you add an update? I seems not finding code to get resourceId from lockId in LockImpl, which should be needed for update.
Updated using lockedResourceId() method instead of lockedResourceId field. Added lazy loading for lockedResourceId to handle if the lock resource is from the List operation.
Need assertion fail when this ManagementException does not happen.
Not exactly sure whether we should throw exception.
This can be used after a Get/List operation for lockedResourceId. It might be better not throwing here.
